# TabletopInteraction.DeadZone.default

**Case**

The default dead zone values.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Interaction zones

- **TabletopInteraction.DeadZone.disabled**: Use this value to disable the dead zone.
- **TabletopInteraction.DeadZone.within(distance:angle:)**: Allows to customize the dead zone values. The object will start moving when the first of these two thresholds is reached.

items.description: Use this value to disable the dead zone.
